name: Conduction Knight Plasma Magnum
description:
2 EARTH Rock monsters
All face-up monsters on the field become EARTH. You can only use each of the following effects of "Conduction Knight Plasma Magnum" once per turn. If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can add 1 "Magnet" Normal, Quick-Play, or Field Spell from your Deck to your hand. You can send 1 Level 8 "Magna Warrior" monster from your Deck to the GY; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Magnet Warrior" monster.
